Description:
Welcome to Kirata - hidden in the Himalayas country with a rich tradition, the world is threatened by a despotic ruler. Your hero, Ajay Gail came here to fulfill the last wish of his mother, but he was embroiled in a civil war: the locals are trying to overthrow the pretender Pagan Mina. Embark on a journey through the open world, but beware: in a foreign country you anything can happen.
Features:
The new game series Far CryÃ‚Â® you find yourself in a distant country, where the beauty and danger of old inseparable. Explore the vast areas covered with wild forests; conquer the snow-capped mountain ranges!
Kirata fauna is diverse: It is home to leopards, rhinos, eagles and even oviphages rather rare badgers - honey badger. Hunter, remember: going after prey, looking at the two, otherwise he will become a victim of ...
Mark enemy positions during the flight to improved giroplane, and if you notice, try to escape with the help of costume-wing. Embark on a journey riding on a huge elephant, the type of which even experienced soldier zatryasutsya hock!
Choose a suitable weapon! No matter how difficult the task may seem: due to the large arsenal of weapons you can get out of any situation.
In the journey is better to go together. In Far Cry 4 is the updated system of playing together: your friend will be able to join at any time. Explore the mysterious world of the company Kirata faithful companion.
Features Repack:
Do not cut / no recoded.
Author: WestMore
Features Gold Edition:
Far Cry 4 Gold Edition includes the Special Edition and the season pass. It is designed for fans of the game, and for new players who want to get the most complete impression of Far Cry 4.
